subject: Football
Pain-Relieving Drugs
lead_paragraph: The union’s stance is at odds with the N.F.L.’s contention that complaints about painkillers were covered under collective bargaining agreements and should be heard by an arbitrator.
snippet: The union’s stance is at odds with the N.F.L.’s contention that complaints about painkillers were covered under collective bargaining agreements and should be heard by an arbitrator.
